ocean.question: I'm big and blue and home to many fish. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my home on my back.
⛱️ You might see me at the beach.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🎱 I have many arms.
🦑 I can squirt ink.
🪸 I live near coral reefs.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and swim very fast. Sometimes, people think I'm smiling. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I'm a mammal, not a fish.
📢 I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🤸 I love to jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I'm very big, swim in the ocean, and sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I spout water from a hole on my back.
🌊 I'm the biggest animal on Earth.
🎼 My songs can travel very far.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. I walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle along the beach.
🦞 Some people like to eat me.
🐚 I can sometimes hide in a shell

ocean.question: I'm a colorful home to many fishes under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals.
🐠 Many colorful fish live with me.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.

ocean.question: I'm a very old creature with a shell, and I lay my eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🏖️ I travel long distances to lay my eggs.
🥗 I eat seagrass and jellyfish.

ocean.question: I am a very large fish with many sharp teeth. I hunt in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I'm often feared, but important to the ocean.
🦷 I have rows of sharp teeth.
🌊 I keep the ocean healthy by eating sick or weak animals.

ocean.question: I'm a creature that looks like a plant but am actually an animal. I have stinging cells. What am I?

hints.text: 🪸 I can be many different colors and shapes.
🌊 Some of my family members can give you a painful sting.
🐟 Small fish sometimes hide in me to be safe.

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a crown, but I'm not a king. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow tall in the forest.
🍃 I have green leaves.
🌰 Birds sometimes build nests in me.

plant.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
😋 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🥗 I am a popular vegetable in salads.

plant.question: I'm round and juicy, and grow on a vine. I can be red, green, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat me as a snack.
🍷 Some people make juice or wine from me.
☀️ I like to grow in sunny places.

plant.question: I am a group of modified leaves that protect a flower bud. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I protect the flower before it blooms.
🌿 I am usually green and leafy.
🌹 You can find me at the base of a flower.

plant.question: I'm a tall plant with a thick stalk and yellow kernels inside. You can pop me for a treat! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in fields.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🌾 Farmers grow me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow high up in trees. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🐿️ Squirrels like to store me for the winter.
🍁 You can find me in forests.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🥗 I am good with ranch dressing.
🌱 I'm a type of cabbage.

plant.question: I have tiny tubes that carry water and nutrients up to the leaves from the roots. What part of the plant am I?

hints.text: 💧 I help the plant stand tall.
💪 I connect the roots to the leaves.
🌲 I am part of a tree and a flower.

plant.question: I make food for the plant using sunlight, water, and air. What part of the plant am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I need the sun to do my job.
🌿 I am usually green.
💨 I use carbon dioxide.

plant.question: I am the part of the plant that holds it in the ground and absorbs water and nutrients. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am usually hidden underground.
💧 I absorb water and nutrients.
🌳 I anchor the plant.
